container.heading: Historical and Forecast Electricity Price Trends

section.heading: Trend Analysis.
section.text: A county shall include in its Aggregation Plan an analysis of historical and forecast trends in electricity prices, including:

para.text: A graph or table of historical Residential and Type I SOS prices for the most recent 36 months of data available for each electric utility within the county; and
A graph or table of a 36-month or longer forecast of residential and small commercial customer energy rates meeting baseline State renewable energy goals for each electric utility within the county.

annotations.annotation: Public Utilities Article, §§1–101(b), (f), and (k), 7–306(f)(5) and (h), 7–306.2(d)(3), 7–507(a), 7–510(f) and 7–510.3, Annotated Code of Maryland
